text: Darlan Pereira Mendes (born 16 April 1998) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the club Grêmio. ==Professional career== Araújo joined the youth academy of Grêmio at the age of 12. Mendes made his professional debut with Grêmio in a 3–0 Campeonato Gaúcho win over São José-PA on 9 March 2019. ==Honours== Grêmio *Recopa Sudamericana: 2018 *Campeonato Gaúcho: 2018, 2019 e 2020 ==References== ==External links== * * Grêmio Profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from São Borja Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players
title: Darlan Mendes
